newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate 6.83 pct at Italy mark repo.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate 6.83 pct at Italy mark repo.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's 3.0 billion mark Bank of Italy one-month repurchase tender was 6.83 percent against 7.03 percent at the previous foreign currency tender which was for one month, the Bank said.
The average indicative rate was 6.85 percent from 7.05 percent at a previous tender for 3.0 billion marks on April 16.
A statement said the tender was fully subscribed and the funds assigned at a minimum 3.12 forward points above the 986.00 lire per mark floor set by the Bank of Italy.
The Bank received 27 bids of which four were met in full and six in part.
